name: 12 Days of Christmas
description:
REMEMBER IT IS EXTREMELY IMPORTANT TO TALK TO NPC'S IN THIS GAME, Go over to the Elf and right click while hovering on it.

The “blindness” in the game that I added was the fact that there was blind spots everywhere which made the platformer tricky. That’s what blindness meant to me. 

Made by Ehan Hassan (Altar#8578)

Partner: Alenthas#1848

Song: 12 Days of Christmas

Verse: Entire song essentially

Credits:

Shaun Spalding (background art)

Alenthas#1848 (pixel assets)
